thread.title: SA Weather Service warns of high fire danger
thread.title_full: SA Weather Service warns of high fire danger | News24

author: news24.com
title: SA Weather Service warns of high fire danger
text:
Johannesburg - The South African Weather Service on Friday issued a warning for high temperatures which may result in fires this weekend.
The advisory follows a heat wave which swept across the country this week.
The South African Weather Service said a heatwave with persistently high temperatures was expected over Gauteng, parts of Limpopo and Mpumalanga until at least Sunday.
On Saturday, Pretoria was expected to reach sweltering highs of 37°C and Johannesburg and Vereeniging at 33°C. The expected UVB sunburn index was warned as extreme.
